page.title: 15THE M5 MOTORWAY.
page.content: This motorway is one of a series of motorways which link up all the major cities. The M5 runs from Exeter, through Bristol and Worcester and runs on to Birmingham. It is here that it joins onto the M6. Junction 7 is quite near to our area and the motorway runs straight through our area. It is the main communication link between the Midlands and the South West of the country. At this moment in time, this motorway is being widened in the county from two to three lanes to cope with the increasing amount of traffic that uses the motorway. It is also hoped that eventually Junction 7 will be connected to the New Bridge in an attempt to cut down on the amount of traffic going through the centre of Worcester on its way to Kempsey,Malvern or beyond.
